channel.title: Toppers on One Stop Pinball Shop
channel.description: Recent content in Toppers on One Stop Pinball Shop

item.title: Pulp Fiction Topper - Jack Rabbit Slim's Dance
item.description: Bring the iconic Jack Rabbit Slim’s dance contest scene to life on your pinball machine! This Pulp Fiction topper features Vincent Vega and Mia Wallace on the backside of the glass, creating a stunning stereoscopic depth effect. The sound-reactive LED strip pulses to the music and game sounds, illuminating the artwork with dynamic lighting.
